post.body: nothing like starting the year with Highway to Hell LOL
It's nice that there's an alternative to leaving the kids at home with a babysitter.
We had a great time, thanks! Ended with a pretty impressive fireworks show. Suggestion for next year: more bathrooms!
I agree that the default joomla install is not nearly secure enough. When I did my cms eval, it came out in the top third tho
I've had a couple Joomla customers get hacked as well
if you run windows on multiple monitors, I highly recommend ultramon. Well worth the 40 bucks.
kids are watching Dude, where's my car?. Now I get to hear "dude" : "sweet" from them for the next wk. Fail.
Kids are disassembling the xmas paraphernalia.
why is kjournald all of a sudden sucking up massive CPU cycles?
Now on Fox sports: the speed, the agility, the athleticism...or not: it's a dart tournament!?
i could use an "easy button"
Disposable web pages? Seems kinda cool I guess. http://disposablewebpage.com/
change is in the air
Home (and warm) safe and sound. Hope everyone else is having a safe and happy new years eve.
bux at first night: http://twitpic.com/ykyl
there is a metric buttload of people in downtown Fullerton. 30 min, lines for the porta potties.
sad: http://twitpic.com/ykfe
just rcvd a text: "new years coming soon, so before I get drunk, naked, arrested, and lose my phone, I want to wish you a happy new year"
I'll be twittering live from First Night Fullerton tonight. Let's see if the kids make it to midnight.
viacom is warning that time warner customers will lose access to their programming INCLUDING ONLINE beginning tonight: http://mtv.com
